name: Petanque In St Tropez Lite
description:
Petanque in St Tropez is a 3D bowls game, as played on the mediterannean coast.
The game features 3D graphics, realistic physics and 3D sounds.
It is as close as possible to reality, you can for example lift your balls, strike opponents balls etc...
Petanque in St Tropez will please to all those that like to pass a good time playing petanque over summer in the sun. Drinks not supplied...
